attributes.action: Abolish the BBC TV licence fee to be replaced by a voluntary subscription.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC has become too big & disconnected with the public that is forced to pay for its services regardless of its quality, content of its programming and reporting. As a nation we are forced to pay for a service that no longer wishes to report fact from an unbiased, neutral stance but wishes to influence & impose its views. I no longer wish to pay for a service that wishes to alter my political and social views & would like the ability to voluntarily pay for the service should I wish to do so.
attributes.background: The BBC has become a biased left wing London centric organisation, no longer happy just reporting the news, but now distorting news reports and programmes with a left wing biased view.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to the one which you submitted:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129836
